Beaker is up to date

Beaker 0.7.5

Information

  • Version: 0.7.5
  • Released: August 4, 2017
  • Size: 65 MB
Build from source Download installer

Beaker 0.7.5

This is a small update! Click on the issue numbers to learn more.

Additions

  • new (#633) Added the debug-log to help diagnose connectivity issues.
  • new (#641) The “not found” page for a dat site will now automatically refresh if the site is found on the network.
  • new (#638) Settings page now gives the versions of node, electron, and chromium which are used internally.
  • new (#639) Added new default bookmarks.

Fixes

  • fix (#634) Staging area no longer incorrectly marks files as changed.
  • fix (#636) New Web APIs now provide useful stack traces.
  • fix (#637) Dat sites can now connect to wss:// websocket servers.
  • fix (#640) Fixed an issue with the URL bar behaving strangely after the URL was deleted.
